How to have a good summer

Tips for having a good summer.

Context

Be sure to do this only during the summer.

Pre-requisites

  • Be done with the spring semester
  • Check the calendar

Steps

  1. Drink lemonade
  2. Watch a movie
    • This is a tip
    • This is a warning statement
    • This is a danger statement
  3. Watch another movie

Post-requisites

  • Be prepared for the fall semester.
